promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a young mythical chameleon dark-type holding a ornate glaive. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glaiveon, a young mythical chameleon dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: wicked-blow, obstruct. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, chameleon-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: A young mythical pokemon with a castle-like spirit, Glaiveon slyly maneuvers obstacles to use its wicked-blow and obstruct foes.
